comments.body: If you happen to change the code based on the comment in the `.d.ts` file then you should omit `booleanDefault` here. It will show as 'undefined' when passed to `meow`

[meow uses Object.assign()](https://github.com/sindresorhus/meow/blob/258659a6e4cf102ef09a7c27efcee1e953808725/index.js) to parse options, so `booleanDefault: undefined` has special meaning compared to omitting key.
https://github.com/sindresorhus/meow#booleandefault
